id: api/Deposit/Create PayPal Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
title: Create PayPal Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
description: The paypalForDeposit mutation allows a user to create a PayPal payment for a deposit into their wallet. It returns an order response with details needed to proceed with the PayPal checkout.
